21.m: Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, he is a new creation. The old has passed away; behold, the new has come. - 2 Corinthians 5:17 (ESV)

l.q: What happens when we receive Christ in our hearts?
l.a: When we receive Christ in our hearts, we become a new creation.

l.q: How did God reconciled the world to Himself?
l.a: Through Christ, God reconciled us to Himself.

l.q: In verse 20, what are we being charged to be?
l.a: We are being charged to be ambassadors for Christ.

21.p: Thank you, Lord Jesus. Each day that I wake up I have already been freed from the bondage of sin and death. Your mercies are new every morning, and each day I wake up with hope in my heart. Thank you for your redeeming love. May you grant me the grace to be a good testimony of your love to others.
